title: Batang Samarahan Bridge
text: Batang Samarahan Bridge () is a new bridge under construction connecting <a href="Kota%20Samarahan">Kota Samarahan</a> and <a href="Asajaya">Asajaya</a> in <a href="Sarawak">Sarawak</a>, <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>. Once completed, the bridge will replace the current ferry service across Batang Samarahan/Sabang river.
